page.title: 12Postlady Pam
page.content:
Postlady Pam's Daily Duties {___________________________ {Salhouse Post Office}gets about 12 sacks of mail a day.Because she owns the only Post Office in Salhouse Pam has a lot of mail to sort.Life in a Post Office can sometimes be exciting and there have been two attempted break_ins and two mysterious 'ticking parcels' which turned out to be alarm clocks.Pam has sorted mail for famous villagers including{Norwich City {footballers}Duncan Forbes, Roy Marsden and{England International}Martin Peters.
report by {Christina Paraskeva and{Rachel Houghton
